body.p:
P. S. Please order ^^ copy of Commonwealth to be sent to C D. Shaw. West Point Ky
Elizabeth Town Ky
Nov 5 1863.
To His Excellency The Governor of Kentucky
Dr Sir
It is my duty as County Judge of Hardin to call your attention to The Enclosed Letter The murder was most foul & aggravated Crime

This is the first definite information I have Received of The Circumstances attending the perpatration of this Most Extraordinary ^murder^ and the only accurate description of the persons: supposed to be guilty although it was Committed on the night of 30th Sept 1863. The Case is respectfully submitted to you for your Action. Yours in The Union Cause

H G. V. Wintersmith
Hardin Co
Reward
$500.
for the apprehension & conviction of the unknown murderers of D. A. Hamilton
Offir Reward of $250.= for apprehension of murderers within 12 months & delivery to Jailor of Hardin County -- to be paid upon conviction of offenses --
